title: Project: Sentiment-Based Crypto Trader
content:
## Twitter/X & Reddit Analysis

Crypto is heavily influenced by social sentiment. We will build a bot that trades based on volume of mentions and sentiment polarity.

### Tools

- **Twitter API / Tweepy**: Stream tweets for cashtags like $BTC, $ETH.
- **VADER Sentiment**: Rule-based sentiment analysis tuned for social media.

### Logic

If sentiment score > Threshold AND Tweet Volume > Moving Average, Buy.
